column1: Uchi////Amazing! If you want to go on a culinary adventure
column2: this place is for you. It has everything: Ducks in a jar
column5: and best of all the waiters know it all. You don't even have to order
column6: just tell them what you like to eat or what you hate and they make your meal for you. Even better
column7: it's small portions leaving you trying lots of things without feeling full.
